languages.text: {n}Дознаватель пораженно качает головой.{/n} "Ярмо? Средство обуздания... звучит как проект грандиозного, планетарного масштаба — и я слышу об этом впервые. Возможно, у моего направления на борьбу с культом — и твое, {name}, сопровождение — было двойное дно. Но почему?"

{n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель пораженно качает головой.{/n} "Ярмо? Средство обуздания... звучит как проект грандиозного, планетарного масштаба — и я слышу об этом впервые. Возможно, у моего направления на борьбу с культом — и твое, {name}, сопровождение — было двойное дно. Но почему?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the Cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

{n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the Cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

{n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the Cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

{n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the Cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは驚いて首を振る。{/n}「くびきだと？束縛を意味するが…惑星規模の、壮大な計画のようだが…これは初耳だ。魔女団と戦い、お前に同行する他にも、隠れた目的が俺の任務にあったのかもしれない、{name}。だが、なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは驚いて首を振る。{/n}「くびきだと？束縛を意味するが…惑星規模の、壮大な計画のようだが…これは初耳だ。魔女団と戦い、お前に同行する他にも、隠れた目的が俺の任務にあったのかもしれない、{name}。だが、なぜだ？」

languages.text: {n}海因里希惊讶地摇着头。{/n}“圣枷？听起来像是某种束缚手段……听起来像是整颗行星规模的大型计划，可我从来都没有听说过。或许，除了扼杀邪恶与协助你行动之外，我的任务还另有目的，{name}。但这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希惊讶地摇着头。{/n}“圣枷？听起来像是某种束缚手段……听起来像是整颗行星规模的大型计划，可我从来都没有听说过。或许，除了扼杀邪恶与协助你行动之外，我的任务还另有目的，{name}。但这是为什么？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête avec étonnement.{/n} « Un joug ? Un moyen de contrainte... Il semble s'agir d'un projet de grande envergure, à l'échelle planétaire... et c'est la première fois que j'en entends parler. Peut-être ma mission avait-elle un dessein caché, autre que combattre le Culte et vous accompagner, {name}. Mais pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête avec étonnement.{/n} « Un joug ? Un moyen de contrainte... Il semble s'agir d'un projet de grande envergure, à l'échelle planétaire... et c'est la première fois que j'en entends parler. Peut-être ma mission avait-elle un dessein caché, autre que combattre le Culte et vous accompagner, {name}. Mais pourquoi ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix agita la cabeza con asombro.{/n} «¿Un yugo? Eso es un método de restricción... Parece un proyecto planetario a gran escala; es la primera vez que oigo hablar de él. Tal vez mi misión escondiera un propósito ulterior, aparte de frenar el Culto y {mf|acompañarle|acompañarla}, {name}. Pero... ¿por qué?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix agita la cabeza con asombro.{/n} «¿Un yugo? Eso es un método de restricción... Parece un proyecto planetario a gran escala; es la primera vez que oigo hablar de él. Tal vez mi misión escondiera un propósito ulterior, aparte de frenar el Culto y {mf|acompañarle|acompañarla}, {name}. Pero... ¿por qué?».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt erstaunt den Kopf.{/n} "Ein Joch? Ein Mittel des Zwangs ... Klingt wie ein Projekt in einem groß angelegten, planetaren Maßstab ... und ich höre gerade zum ersten Mal davon. Vielleicht hatte meine Entsendung außer der Bekämpfung des Kultes und Eurer Begleitung ja noch einen geheimen Zweck, {name}. Aber warum?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt erstaunt den Kopf.{/n} "Ein Joch? Ein Mittel des Zwangs ... Klingt wie ein Projekt in einem groß angelegten, planetaren Maßstab ... und ich höre gerade zum ersten Mal davon. Vielleicht hatte meine Entsendung außer der Bekämpfung des Kultes und Eurer Begleitung ja noch einen geheimen Zweck, {name}. Aber warum?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, şaşkınlıkla başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Boyunduruk mu? Zapt için kullanılır... Koca, gezegen ölçütünde bir proje gibi geliyor kulağa. Bense ilk kez duyuyorum. Tarikatla savaşıp sana eşlik etmenin yanında vazifemin gizli bir başka amacı olabilir mi {name}? Sebebi nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head in amazement.{/n} "A yoke? A means of restraint... It sounds like a project on a grand, planetary scale — and this is the first I'm hearing of it. Perhaps there was a hidden purpose to my assignment besides combatting the cult and accompanying you, {name}. But why?"
